Title: Hargax’s Pit-beasts
Legend: Hargax once ruled the gladiatorial Pit of Shattered Spines with a fist of iron. Even when overthrown by a younger rival, the ogroid was not slain. Determined to reclaim his throne, Hargax – now older and wiser – seeks a means of evening the odds. He roams the lands searching for monsters to break into submission.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Unique, Single. These units must be taken as a set referred to as Hargax’s Pit-beasts. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.
